description.narrative: This is budget revision aim to insert financial year 2009 and to implement the recommendations of the evaluation undertaken during 2008 (Cost sharing - US$13,783.00/GoA) and (TRAC 1 - US$120,000.00/UNDP).

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: RRF closure in 2009 and will be replaced by a Community Enhanced Demining a type of community development mine action related project. Provisional indicators are: Nr of high priority minefields in rural areas identified by community gender balanced demining teams. Nr of cleared low threat areas in rural areas through community gender balanced demining teams. Directed community clearance operations increases the confidence in its totality for land use of the cleared areas. Stimulated post-clearance development assistance by the government and interested agencies using low financial costs through the work performed by communities.
